| Data Member Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `AllowTurning` | `logic` | Controls if `fort_character` can still turn while in stasis. |

| `AllowEmotes` | `logic` | Controls if `fort_character` can still perform emotes while in stasis. |
